name: Ultimate Xbox UI
desc: Ultimate Xbox UI v2.2 BCML Edition: Replaces the WiiU UI with the Xbox UI

options.name: Standard Layout
options.desc: The original experience of the game

options.name: Western Layout
options.desc: Like the standard layout, but buttons A and B are swapped

options.name: Alternative Layout
options.desc: The main controls are evenly assigned across the gamepad. Similar to the Elden Ring controls
